ivardefs.name: additionalInstruction_
ivardefs.desc: Supplemental instructions to the patient on how to take the medication  (e.g. "with meals" or"take half to one hour before food") or warnings for the patient about the medication (e.g. "may cause drowsiness" or "avoid exposure of skin to direct sunlight o

ivardefs.name: doseAndRate.type
ivardefs.desc: The kind of dose or rate specified, for example, ordered or calculated.

ivardefs.name: maxDosePerAdministration
ivardefs.desc: Upper limit on medication per administration.

ivardefs.name: maxDosePerLifetime
ivardefs.desc: Upper limit on medication per lifetime of the patient.

ivardefs.name: maxDosePerPeriod
ivardefs.desc: Upper limit on medication per unit of time.

ivardefs.name: patientInstruction
ivardefs.desc: Instructions in terms that are understood by the patient or consumer.

ivardefs.name: sequence
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the order in which the dosage instructions should be applied or interpreted.

ivardefs.name: text
ivardefs.desc: Free text dosage instructions e.g. SIG.

properties.desc: Base StructureDefinition for Dosage Type: Indicates how the medication is/was taken or should be taken by the patient.
